          "variants": {
            "on": true,
            "off": false
          },
          "defaultVariant": "off"
        },

          "description": "Triggers full manual garbage collections in the ad service",
          "state": "ENABLED",
          "variants": {
            "on": true,
            "off": false
          },
          "defaultVariant": "off"
        },
        "adHighCpu": {
          "description": "Triggers high cpu load in the ad service",
          "state": "ENABLED",
          "variants": {
            "on": true,
            "off": false
          },
          "defaultVariant": "off"
        },
        "adFailure": {

          "state": "ENABLED",
          "variants": {
            "on": true,
            "off": false
          },
          "defaultVariant": "off"
        },
        "kafkaQueueProblems": {
